name: WWDC 2015 Scholarship Submissions
body:
![WWDC Banner](https://devimages.apple.com.edgekey.net/wwdc/images/wwdc15-hero_2x.png) #WWDC2015 Student Scholarship Submissions List of student submissions for WWDC 2015 scholarship.
Add your own below, just submit a pull request!
